job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a research-oriented engineer to design, develop and test algorithms and architectures for unstructured information retrieval and classification. As a full-time engineer, you will take ownership of research and development of various algorithms for information extraction, language understanding and image processing. You will also be involved in writing scripts for web crawling, data cleansing and model validation.Preferred Educational QualificationsB.Tech/M.Tech with relevant projects.Required SkillsC/C++/PythonTensorflow/PyTorchOpenCV or similar toolkitsExposure to NLP in a professional environmentStrong theoretical understanding of probability theory and machine learningStrong understanding of data structures and algorithmsDesired SkillsBuilding web applications and creating REST APIsDatabases - SQL or NoSQLIf you're data-driven and are looking to work on cutting-edge research and development, apply right away!
